alert.note: Alert for Becker; Hubbard; Otter Tail; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 5:45PM CDT until May 30 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... Northwestern Wadena County in central Minnesota... Northeastern Otter Tail County in west central Minnesota... Southeastern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Perham, or 23 miles southeast of Detroit Lakes, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported hail up to half dollar size hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perham, Menahga, Osage, Hubbard, Wolf Lake, Hillview and Evergreen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
